website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive, light-duty knife sheath for blades no longer than five inches.
pros: If a low price and very basic knife protection are all you need, this could be for you
cons: The materials used to make it are not as sturdy or durable as some others
it's for people on a tight budget who don't need much in the way of knife protection

customer_reviews.title: The vinyl keeper strap is too loose.
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic vinyl cloth sheath with a very loose vinyl loop keeper. I wouldn't trust the strap to hold my knife in the sheath. Would buy the leather sheathes offered by others instead. They have a leather snap holder which ensures your knife won't fall out unexpectedly.
customer_reviews.author: treehugger

customer_reviews.title: Basic Cheap Sheath
customer_reviews.text: It's OK, no flaws, and it fits my 110mm Terava Puuko. This is a decent sheath to house a knife that you throw in your glove box, but you probably wouldn't want to take it on a wilderness survival adventure. I got it for around $7 delivered, so I really can't critique it much. The velcro tab holds my puuko in place, but there is definitely some wiggle going on.
customer_reviews.author: Punamoke

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nylon over plastic with a terribly weak Velcro secure strap.. It's cheap and unreliable. Recommend a better sheath.
customer_reviews.author: Optimus Riker

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It's a basic knife sheath, the rivets are a nice touch but unless you luck out the fit will likely be loose and the Velcro wrap may not be tight enough on the handle unless it's a oversize handle like on the KBar or pilots survival knife.
customer_reviews.author: NCJohn

customer_reviews.title: ... got this today in the mail and I really liked it at first
customer_reviews.text: I got this today in the mail and I really liked it at first. It felt nice and looked alright. The velcro strap is just useless and barely holds together. Then came the biggest upset ever, I slid my knife into the sheath and bam, the tip of my knife sliced right through the sheath and cut my hand. I guess it's an alright sheath if you don't keep your knives sharp or pointy. I just threw the thing away and bandaged my hand up. What a complete waste of time and money. This would be okay for a toy knife.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Measure your knife and confirm the dimensions of the sheath to get a good fit. Durable material, great value.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Workman

customer_reviews.title: This item is cheap and of poor quality. I sent it back immediately after seeing ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is cheap and of poor quality. I sent it back immediately after seeing it. Two pieces of cardboard, duct taped together would be better. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Rreagan

customer_reviews.title: Well made Sheath.
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Good Quality material and good rigidity for a nylon case.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: My knife fit perfectly and for the price you can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Ollin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Roach Belly perfectly, well made, would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: MonstaJamma

customer_reviews.title: Overall poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Awful. The cheap fabric latch doesn't keep the knife in place. Overall poor build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent sheath for the price. The strap that wraps around the knife handle needs more Velcro to allow for a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: MV Fan

customer_reviews.title: Knife Sheath
customer_reviews.text: Well, I could go on and on about how fantastical, amazing, outrageous and stealthy this knife sheath is...but it's a frickin' knife sheath. It's really a wonder. I put my knife in it and it held it. WOW. The fact that it cost about the same as a good cup of coffee, BONUS!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: good generic sheath
customer_reviews.text: a good generic sheath, using it to replace one from my knife manufacturer that just wasn't up to the job
customer_reviews.author: Malonejr

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy sheath, velcro doesn't last long though. It pulls apart after a few times opening
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D'Annunzio

customer_reviews.title: Great price, Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this sheath. It fits my Humvee 4 and one half inch fixed blade perfectly. Only thing that could use some work is the velcro strap for the handle. Needs to be lowered about and inch. Which I can do on my own. Very happy with this purchase, and I recommend it for any fixed blade around the 5 inch range
customer_reviews.author: Elisha J.

customer_reviews.title: Fits knife nicely, and velcro on top to hold handle in ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits knife nicely, and velcro on top to hold handle in is tougher than I thought it would be. Would buy again if need arose.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

product_meta.title: Sheath Straight Knife Sheath 5in. Black
product_meta.description:
Straight Knife Sheath. Will fit most fixed blade knives with up to 5" blade. Black finish heavy nylon construction.

* Opening for blade is approximately 1 1/2" wide.
* Nylon webbing loop on back to fit up to 2" wide belt.
